Toasted wood, a bit smoke, caramel, floral, citrus.. A great whisky to taste in a bar

Follow me on insta: @whiskperience

Nosing: Mild pepper, creamy toffee sweetness that is very pleasant to the nose 
2.75

Flavour; Creamy, thick, wet raisin flavours 
2.75

Finish: mild mild mild smoke 
2
